plot: A "prequel" of sorts to "Butch Cassidy and the Sundance Kid," chronicling the two outlaws' lives in the years before the events portrayed in the Newman/Redford movie.
title: Los primeros golpes de Butch Cassidy y Sundance
plot_es: A "prequel" of sorts to "Butch Cassidy and the Sundance Kid," chronicling the two outlaws' lives in the years before the events portrayed in the Newman/Redford movie.
original_name: Butch and Sundance: The Early Days

cast.role: The Sundance Kid /              Harry Alonzo Longabaugh
